channel.title: SaaS Lessons Learned in 2013 from KickoffLabs
channel.description:
Some good stuff in this article about experimenting with pricing, free trials, etc:
http://blog.kickofflabs.com/lessons-learned-2013/

item.title: SaaS Lessons Learned in 2013 from KickoffLabs
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
I was one of the few people who came to your site, saw you had no free plan, and left.

I ended up trying one of your competitor(can’t remember who, but I did end up paying them around $20 for add-ons). But I found them too much of a hassle, and found it easier (and cheaper) to just get a Wordpress based site.

Read full topic
item.source: SaaS Lessons Learned in 2013 from KickoffLabs

item.title: SaaS Lessons Learned in 2013 from KickoffLabs
item.dc:creator: anon3850446
item.description:
Thanks for sharing. I’m not planning any SAAS, but there are some good ideas in there that apply to all types of software. Great post.

Read full topic
